# Using Bio3D in R for structural bioinformatics

```{r}
# library(bio3d)
pdb <- read.pdb("1hel")
pdb
```
```{r}
pdb$atom
```

Do a Normal mode analysis (NMA) a prediction of the conformational variability and intrinsic dynamics of this protein.
```{r}
m <- nma(pdb)
plot(m)
```
```{r}
mktrj(m, file="nma.pdb")

```
